person.persName: David B. Ladd (Christian co. resident, sergeant in the 52nd Ky Mtd Inf and the 17th Ky Cav.)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Jason Ladd and Mary A. Ladd. Resident in Christian County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident in Christian County in 1861. Served in the 52nd Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private and sergeant from September 26,1863, to November 17, 1864. Served in the 17th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a sergeant from December 5, 1864, to September 20, 1865.
